column5: Phew!!  My commute was going to be awful....I remember the last time this happened, my normal 1 hour drive to the suburbs was easily 1.5 to 2 hours.  Thanks for the link Cliff!

So just telecommute. If you can't do that to beat the traffic just go in at 1 AM Monday work right through till Tuesday about 10 or 11 PM. and that is assuming 3 or 4 1 hour lunch breaks!!!!  You would have your 40 in for the week so then you could then go fishing..... win win I say.
I'm even more relieved. I was looking forward to my regular 2.5 hour run down to Leslie & York Mills turning into a 3+ hour fiasco.  JF
They've been back in service for a couple hours now, I've seen several around town.
